tool_description:
**API for Financial Calculator - Mortgage, Reverse Mortgage, EMI, PreEMI, Loan, Retirement, Fixed Deposit, Monthly Income, Recrring Deposit**
Mortgage, EMI, Loan, Retirement, and other financial products can be integrated into WordPress, your website, or your app. Mortgage Calculator, Home Loan Calculator, Personal Loan Calculator, Car Loan Calculator, Retirement Calculator, Fixed Deposit Calculator, Recrring Deposit Calculator, Monthly Payout Calculator, PreEMI Vs FullEMI Calculator, EMI Pla...
name: Yawin Calculator
title: Yawin Calculator

api_list.name: Recurring Deposit (RD) Calculator
api_list.description:
Calculate Recurring Deposit Interest, Maturity Amount, After-Tax Amount, After-Inflation Value of Money, Recurring Deposit Schedules, Return on Investment etc

Recurring Deposit (RD) Calculator is used to calculate interest on fixed amount deposited by monthly for a period, say 1 year, 2 year, 5 year. 
This calculator consider the principle amount, yearly interest and number of months. 
Compound periods are 0-Monthly, 1- Quaterly, 2-Half Yearly and 3-Yearly. By default calculates Yearly.
This calculator will consider tax paid on interest and yearly inflation rate to find actual appreciation.
The recurring deposit appreciation schedules are optionaly included in the response. The schedules are generated with pagination like page size and page number

There are 3 examples added here

All PayLoad Option
Minimum PayLoad Option
PayLoad Option without Schedule
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yawin-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/rdcalculator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yawin-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yawin-calculator.p.rapidapi.com/rdcalculator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yawin-calculator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retirement Calculator By Current Expenses
api_list.description:
Calculate Retirement amount by investing systematic investment. Calculate monthly retirement amount, monthly RD amount to save / invest, interest received, return on investment etc.

This Retirement calculator supports by investing in RD till your retirement and utilizes the accumulated amount for retirement amount. This calculator will support inflation and taxes. You can decide either by your monthly investment amount or based on your current expense.

There are 6 examples added here

1. All PayLoad Option
2. Minimum PayLoad Option - Monthly Payable amount
3. Minimum PayLoad Option - Current expenses
4. PayLoad with inflation
5. Payload with tax
6. PayLoad Option without Schedule

api_list.name: Reverse Mortgage Calculator
api_list.description:
Calculate Reverse Mortgage Monthly Payment Amount, Interest Amount, Mortgage Schedules, Mortgage Balance, Mortgage Balance Percentage etc

Reverse Mortgage Calculator is used to calculate  reverse mortgage on self occupied house for the person of age above 60.
Compound periods are 1-Monthly, 2- Quarterly, 3-Half Yearly and 4-Yearly. By default calculates Monthly.


There are 3 examples added here

All PayLoad Option
Minimum PayLoad Option
PayLoad Option without Schedule

api_list.name: FD with Monthly Payment Calculator
api_list.description:
Calculate Monthly Payment on Fixed Deposit, Fixed Deposit Interest,  Fixed Deposit Schedules, Return on Investment etc

Fixed Deposit (FD) with Monthly payment Calculator is used to calculate monthly payment received on fixed deposit.
This calculator consider the principle amount, yearly interest, number of months and monthly payment amount

The fixed deposit appreciation schedules are optionaly included in the response. The schedules are generated with pagination like page size and page number

There are 3 examples added here

1. All PayLoad Option
2. Minimum PayLoad Option
3. PayLoad Option without Schedule
